title: Mirage Blossom Flower (Part 1)
body:
Mirage Blossom Flower (Part 1)

Thud -!

The giant body of the sand serpent fall to the ground and Evan sat down on its head while exhaling a deep breath.

'Sand serpents is just an above average B+ rank monster, but it still took some effort for me to kill it. If I consider all the things my power should be around the peak of B+ rank' Evan stood up and looked at the dead serpent. 

'Once my prime core also advanced to C rank, I shouldn't have any problem dealing with any B+ rank monster' Evan thought and smiled a little. 

He was quite pleased with his current power, especially with his spiritual strength. 

Earlier he used mind suppression on the sand serpent, and the result was surprising. 

Previously his spiritual power was even weaker than a D rank hamster, but now it is already on par or even higher than a B+ rank monster.
